comments.author: lisa
comments.content:
The only packaged coconut water that I enjoy is O.N.E. Coconut Water!

You can buy online at:

www.onenaturalexperience.com

comments.author: vid
comments.content: I agree, O.N.E is good, but NAKED brand is better!  I'm from india and know what a good fresh coconut should taste like.. slightly sweet, and crisp. but in the us, it's easiest to get it packaged...the trick is also not to get the plastic bottles, but the paper-ish ones instead.
